name: Cow says Baa kids Tee
description:
Our funky farmhands fairtrade range is perfect for getting the kids raring to go .

This t-shirt is 100% ethical, fairtrade high quality cotton and printed in the UK.

The Cow Says Baa design is available in chalk blue from sizes 3-4y through to 7-8y.

Good for both girls and boys, all designs have been worn and test driven by our 5 year old.

The t-shirts machine wash beautifully at 40 degrees.

Iron on reverse - best not to tumble dry.

We aim to be an ethical and eco-conscious company where possible - all our packaging is bio-degradeable, even our delivery envelopes.

options.name: Cow says Baa kids Tee BLUE size 3-4yrs
Cow says Baa kids Tee BLUE size 5-6yrs
Cow says Baa kids Tee BLUE size 7-8yrs

name: Pig says Cluck kids tee
description:
Our funky farmhands fairtrade range is perfect for getting the kids raring to go .

This t-shirt is 100% fairtrade high quality cotton and printed in the UK.

The Pig Says Cluck design is available in either bang on trend colours of rich racing green or bold burgundy

Good for both girls and boys, all designs have been worn and test driven by our 5 year old.

The t-shirts machine wash beautifully at 40 degrees.

Iron on reverse of t-shirt - best not to tumble dry. 

We aim to be an ethical and eco-conscious company where possible so all our packaging is bio-degradeable, even our delivery envelopes.

name: Sheep says Moo Kids Tee in Pink
description:
Our funky farmhands fairtrade range is perfect for getting the kids raring to go .

This t-shirt is 100% fairtrade high quality cotton and printed in the UK.

The Sheep Says Moo design is available in pink from sizes 5-6y through to 8-9y.

This colour is aimed mainly at girls but also looks very cool on boys ! All designs have been worn and test driven by our 5 year old.

The t-shirts machine wash beautifully at 40 degrees.

Iron on reverse - best not to tumble dry.

We aim to be an ethical and eco-conscious company where possible - all our packaging is bio-degradeable, even our delivery envelopes.
